issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
New bug description: iOS needs to have parity with the Android debugger. This includes: - Providing function arguments in callframe - Allowing access to the 'arguments' variable -- NOTE: We can't always force the 'arguments' variable onto the callframe register due to an optimization of TiCore - Filtering of global variables to remove those injected by TiCore and Titanium - Flag parity (see below!) Original bug description (flag parity): {html}

Need to pass correct variables info flags back to the IDE. Some information on the metadata on variables is available at:

http://www.oxymoronical.com/experiments/xpcomref/applications/Firef...

Also, Max updated the local wiki with the new Aptana debugger protocol info, which includes information on which flags to send back (and he will probably say when, as well)

{html}

comments.body: Patched well enough to be considered feature-complete for RC.
